notes: While I am new to Proxmox, 3CX, and some phone systems, my experience with Linux, Windows Server, Mikrotik, and troubleshooting a wide range of network and VOIP issues means I can learn these quickly. I am committed to excellent communication, documentation, and continuous learning to support both customers and teams.

php_stack.php: Familiar with PHP basics, actively learning advanced concepts and frameworks (CakePHP, Laravel). Strong ability to master new tools quickly.
php_stack.wordpress: Extensive experience building, customizing, and maintaining WordPress sites, including custom themes, plugins, and efficient builds.
php_stack.mysql: Proficient in MySQL database design, optimization, and troubleshooting.
php_stack.api_integration: Skilled in integrating REST APIs with WordPress and custom solutions.
php_stack.git: Daily use of Git for version control and collaboration.
php_stack.linux_server_management: Confident managing Linux servers for hosting, deployment, and troubleshooting.
